location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: There are files notes at the end of the file.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and can be found in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains one letter (folio 2) from Patrick D Stobart, British Political Officer at Sharjah, to Cornelius James Pelly, British Political Agent at Bahrain. The letter concerns consideration of a possible strengthening of the Sharjah agency guard as a result of increased touring required of the Political Officer in the future. The file also includes file notes (folio 3).
